name: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 2
description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 2 is the sequel to one of the best rated horror escape games, acclaimed for its story and the atmosphere of horror mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1.5Ghz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (Shader model 2.0); 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.5Ghz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
